name: Rat Hunter
description:
Hate rats? Shoot them!

"This is as fun as the real thing !!!" -Rootentootenshooten

"I love this game when I'm mad I can take it out on these rats" -Create Love

"Having had a small rat problem in my back garden this year, this app is extremely therapeutic. Would be nice to have levels of difficulty or something to expand on it." -Ratcathcer1

• Note : No Real Animals Were Harmed During the Making of This Game.

• Bug reports or Suggestions Please Mail to rathunter@lightArtGames.com
